long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hydrozen.io is an uptime monitoring SaaS platform which lets you monitor uptime of websites, cron jobs, domain expiry etc.

This extension uses the Hydrozen.io API key and act as a quick view dashboard which shows the status of those monitors directly on the extension without needing to log into the platform.
